artifactDefinition.businessDescription: A Role is a property that can support one or more accounts or identities as members.
artifactDefinition.businessExample: Used for implementing Roles or other behaviors that may need a property that can hold one or more members.

analogies.name: Minter
analogies.description: A member of the minter group would be allowed to invoke the mint behavior.

influencedBySymbols.description: Roles should be used to control what accounts can set who can be a member.

properties.name: Role
properties.valueDescription: Name of a role that can have a list of accounts in the role.

propertyInvocations.name: AddRoleMember
propertyInvocations.description: Add a party or account to a particular role.

inputParameters.name: RoleId
inputParameters.valueDescription: Name or Id of the Role

inputParameters.name: AccountId
inputParameters.valueDescription: Id of account to add to the Role

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: A confirmation receipt or error may be returned to the invoker based on the outcome of the request.

propertyInvocations.name: RemoveRoleMember
propertyInvocations.description: Remove a party or account to a particular role

inputParameters.name: RoleId
inputParameters.valueDescription: Name or Id of the Role

inputParameters.name: AccountId
inputParameters.valueDescription: Id of account to add to the Role

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: A confirmation receipt or error may be returned to the invoker based on the outcome of the request.
